snippet: Before returning to the lineup for the Devils’ victory in Game 4, Henrik Tallinder had missed 58 straight games because of a blood clot in his left leg.
abstract: Henrik Tallinder had missed 58 straight games because of a blood clot in his left leg before returning to the lineup for the New Jersey Devils’ victory in Game 4 of the Stanley Cup finals.
lead_paragraph: Before returning to the lineup for the Devils’ victory in Game 4, Henrik Tallinder had missed 58 straight games because of a blood clot in his left leg.

headline.seo: Defenseman Hopes to Boost Devils With His Return
headline.main: Long-Idle Defenseman Talked His Way Back on the Ice
headline.print_headline: Long-Idle Defenseman Talked His Way Back on the Ice
